messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Necessary report cards
messages.msgSnippet: Alrighty then..I ll give it a try! MamaBeth marbleface@aol.com wrote: Yep -- A spreadsheet with appropriate column headings is all we needed for a Tae Kwon Do
messages.messageBody:
Alrighty then..I'll give it a try!

MamaBeth

marbleface@... wrote:
Yep --

A spreadsheet with appropriate column headings is all we needed for a Tae
Kwon Do thing. DS graded himself and gave himself an A on everything but
handwriting -- which really is pretty horrible. :)

Nance

In a message dated 1/8/2004 8:45:52 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

Make one up on your computer, complete with grades.
We did this for karate one year when the kids wanted
the educational badges given out.

There are several blank report cards on the internet
you could just print on paper, maybe make up a
letterhead for your "homeschool" and give them grades.
